data.name: RTK13WPK - Additional scenario "Five Path Invasion" 追加シナリオ「五路侵攻」
data.detailed_description:
※Valid only for Romance of the Three Kingdoms w/PUK.

The scenario "Five Path Invasion" will be added.

▼Five Path Invasion
Seeing an opportunity in the death of Liu Bei, Sima Yi devises a plan to defeat Zhuge Liang.
Shu is invaded from five sides by Meng Huo from the south, Sun Quan from the east, and by the officers of Cao Pi.
data.about_the_game:
※Valid only for Romance of the Three Kingdoms w/PUK.

data.short_description: The scenario "Five Path Invasion" will be added.

fullgame.name: ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIII / 三國志13

data.supported_languages:
Japanese*, Traditional Chinese*, English
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7, Windows Vista®
  • Processor: Pentium®4 1.6GHz or over
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024×768 over or 1280×720 over display
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: Shader model: Version 3.0, VRAM: 256MB over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7, Windows Vista®
  • Processor: Core2 Duo 2.0GHz or over
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024×768 over or 1280×720 over display
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: Shader model: Version 3.0, VRAM: 512MB over
